questions.question: How well do you handle disappointment or failure?
options: a) I find it extremely difficult to handle
b) I struggle to cope with it
c) I recover, but it takes some time
d) I bounce back quickly and learn from it

questions.question: How often do you feel a strong sense of empathy towards others' problems?
When faced with a challenging problem, I am:
options: d) Usually calm but slightly anxious

questions.question: How frequently do you engage in self-reflection regarding your emotions and thoughts?
options: d) A few times a week

questions.question: How do you typically react when a close friend achieves success?
options: b) Feel happy but slightly envious
c) Feel overjoyed and genuinely happy for them

questions.question: How effectively can you manage your anger in challenging situations?
In conflicts with others, what is your usual approach?
options: d) Attempt to resolve it but with some frustration

questions.question: How do you typically respond to constructive criticism?
options: a) React negatively and become upset
b) Accept it but feel somewhat defensive
c) Embrace it and seek improvement
d) Get defensive and resist the feedback

questions.question: How often do you experience a sense of contentment and inner peace?
What is your reaction when you witness someone in pain?
options: a) Don't pay much attention to it
b) Feel deeply empathetic and want to help immediately
c) Sympathize but don't necessarily take action
d) Feel empathy and offer help if possible

questions.question: How frequently do you seek emotional support from friends or family when upset?
How do you typically respond to setbacks?
options: a) Feel completely defeated and give up
b) Stay positive and keep moving forward
c) Feel discouraged and might give up temporarily
d) Experience a mix of emotions but stay motivated

questions.question: How do you react when someone criticizes your appearance or choices?
options: a) Get deeply hurt and offended
c) Brush it off, but it lingers in your mind
d) Don't let it bother me

questions.question: How well can you manage stress and pressure in your life?
How often do you feel a sense of joy and excitement about the future?
How do you typically respond when you observe someone being treated unfairly?
options: a) Ignore it and mind my own business
b) Offer support but with some reluctance
c) Actively stand up for them
d) Express my disapproval but might not take action

questions.question: How often do you experience a strong sense of gratitude for the people and things in your life?
How well can you understand and manage your own emotions?
How do you typically respond when you make a mistake?
options: a) Deny it and avoid responsibility
c) Accept it but feel somewhat defensive
d) Accept it and take responsibility

questions.question: How often do you experience feelings of jealousy or envy?
Which gas imparts the green color to plants?
Which nutrient is crucial for building and repairing body tissues?
Which of the following is an autotrophic organism?
Which part of the human brain is responsible for regulating functions such as breathing, heart rate, and digestion?
Which organelle is responsible for producing ATP, the energy currency of the cell?
If the age of one friend is 40 years, what is the average age of the remaining friends?
How many liters of alcohol were in the original mixture?
How many liters of each solution should be mixed to get 10 liters of a 50% alcohol solution?
If A can complete a task in 8 days, B can complete it in 12 days, and C can complete it in 16 days, how long will it take for all three working together to complete the task?

Two trains, A and B, start from the same station at the same time. Train A travels at 60 km/h, while Train B travels at 75 km/h. If Train A reaches its destination in 5 hours, how long does it take for Train B to reach its destination?
Pipe A can fill a tank in 8 hours, while Pipe B can empty the same tank in 12 hours. If both pipes are opened together, how long will it take to fill the tank?
From a point 45 meters above the water, the angle of elevation to the top of a tower is 30°. What is the height of the tower?
A bag contains 6 red balls and 4 blue balls. If 3 balls are drawn randomly without replacement, what is the probability that all 3 balls are red?
In how many ways can 5 girls and 3 boys be seated in a row so that no two boys are together?
A product's price increased by 25%, and then it decreased by 20%. What is the net percentage change in the price?
A shopkeeper sells a shirt for ₹800 at a loss of 20%. What was the cost price of the shirt?
Solve for x: 2x^3 - 5x^2 + 3x - 1 = 0.
If you draw a card from a standard deck of 52 cards, what is the probability of drawing a red card (heart or diamond)?
What is the probability of flipping a coin and getting heads three times in a row?
If you roll a fair six-sided die, what is the probability of rolling an even number (2, 4, or 6)?
If you roll a pair of fair six-sided dice, what is the probability of getting a sum of 7?
A bag contains 5 red balls and 3 green balls. If 2 balls are drawn randomly without replacement, what is the probability that both balls are red?
If a number is increased by 20% and then decreased by 10%, what is the net percentage change in the number?
What is the next number in the Fibonacci sequence: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, ...?
If a bag contains 5 red balls and 3 green balls, what is the probability of randomly selecting a red ball?
If all cats have tails, and Fluffy has a tail, what can you conclude?
A train travels from Station A to Station B at 60 km/h and returns from Station B to Station A at 40 km/h. What is the average speed for the round trip?
If all roses are flowers, and some flowers fade quickly, can you conclude that some roses fade quickly?
If ZEBRA is coded as AFIRW, how is TIGER coded?
Which Indian state is known as the "Land of Five Rivers"?
Who was the first woman to climb Mount Everest from India?
Who developed the first successful polio vaccine?
Which planet in our solar system has the largest number of moons?
Who composed the classical music composition "Raga Yaman"?
In which year was the Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO) founded?
Who was the first Emperor of the Maurya Dynasty in ancient India?
If you cut a sphere parallel to its equator, what shape will the cross-section be?
Which Indian state is famous for the celebration of the Hornbill Festival?
Who wrote the famous book "The Discovery of India"?
Which planet is known as the "Evening Star" or "Morning Star" and is often visible just after sunset or before sunrise?
